body.description: The posted body. This is a fully parsed object.

initiator.description: The webpage that initiated the request.

location.description: Parsed information from the request URL.

domain.description: The domain portion of the request URL.

hash.description: The hash portion of the request URL.

host.description: The host portion of the request URL. Includes port number

hostname.description: The host portion of the request URL without the port number.

origin.description: The origin portion of the request URL.

path.description: The path of the request URL.

port.description: The port of the request URL.

protocol.description: The protocol portion of the request URL.

query.description: The query string portion of the request URL.

method.description: HTTP method that the request is made with.

requestId.description: ID that can be used to pair requests with responses.

url.description: The URL the request is being made to. Contains the full host, path, and query string.

type.description: The type of event. For network requests it's always 'netreq'.
